attributes.text: It has title Poke the Dots
It has a black background
It has aspect ratio 5:4

description.text: The game displays a small dot

attributes.text: It is red
It moves twice as fast in the vertical direction as the horizontal direction

description.text: The game displays a big dot

attributes.text: It is blue
It moves twice as fast in the horizontal direction as the vertical direction
It indicates the time since the game started
It starts at 0
It is in the top left corner of the window
It uses large font size
It is white on black

description.text: When the player clicks the mouse inside the window

attributes.text: If the dots have not collided
The dots teleport to random locations
The dot speeds remain the same
The dot trajectories remain the same
The dots stop moving
The score stops incrementing
The game displays a game over message

description.text: The game displays a game over message

attributes.text: It is in the bottom left corner of the window
It uses large font size
It uses small dot colour on big dot colour

description.text: When the player clicks the close icon

attributes.text: The game closes the window
It starts in a random location
It starts moving down and to the right
It moves in a straight line
It moves at a constant speed
It bounces off the window edges
